job.title: Senior Data Scientist, Analytics
job.description:
This position is open to remote applicants.


WHAT YOU WILL DO

· Wrangle and analyze large data sets from multiple data sources, including our internal data mesh, third party vendors, and customer feeds

· Provide insights to help business, product, and engineering leaders understand customer needs, trends in malware and malicious/anomalous behaviors, and user and system behaviors

· Find actionable strategic insights in the data, create reports and presentations to summarize findings, and partner with product managers and executives to inform and influence strategic decisions

· Work with product and expert teams to define and evaluate key product metrics

· Build, operationalize, and automate analytics assessments and reports using SQL and Python within a cloud-based infrastructure

· Act as a leader across analytics efforts in BB’s cybersecurity division, fostering best practices for analytics and data (efficiency, robustness, integrity, quality, standardization, automation, etc) across all internal analytics, engineering, and product teams


QUALIFICATIONS

· Master’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or other quantitative field

-7 years of experience with a Bachelor or 5+ years with a Masters, of experience in data analytics or related quantitative role (2+ years with a PhD)

· Expertise in SQL and development experience with Python

· Experience working with large data sets using distributed computing tools (Hadoop, Hive, Spark, etc) in a cloud environment

· Deep understanding of statistical methods and applications (hypothesis testing, probability, regression, experimentation)

· Great verbal and written communication skills and the ability to communicate the results of analyses to both technical and non-technical audiences

· Strong skills in problem solving, organization, and critical thinking


ABOVE AND BEYOND

· Doctorate in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or other quantitative field

· Experience employing machine learning algorithms (e.g., time series, clustering, anomaly detection, etc) on real world problems

· Mentoring experience within an analytical environment

· Experience in cybersecurity
